snippet: The billionaire Aleksandr Y. Lebedev is being investigated for throwing a punch at a fellow entrepreneur on a prime-time television talk show, prosecutors said Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The billionaire Aleksandr Y. Lebedev is being investigated for throwing a punch at a fellow entrepreneur on a prime-time television talk show, prosecutors said Tuesday.

headline.main: Russia: After Televised Punch, Billionaire Is Being Investigated
headline.print_headline: Russia: After Televised Punch, Billionaire Is Being Investigated
headline.seo: Russia: After Televised Punch, Lebedev Is Being Investigated
